modName: All Shouts And Spells And Get To Master
summary: Makes it easy to get all shouts and spells and get to master
descriptionHtml:
Makes it easy to get all shouts and spells and get to master

*** TO INSTALL***

Go To The Skyrim Folder (C:Program Files (x86)Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim)

Then Add The BAT files In The Skyrim Folder NOT THE DATA FOLDER

Play

To get The Stuff You Must Type In The Console

* bat AllShouts For All The Shouts

*bat AllSpells For All The Vanilla Spells

*bat master for all of your skills to be lvl 100

(Without the *)

Thats all

Have a good time being a god!
author: John123967
